about_the_game:
This hit title first released on e-reader app Lovestruck: Choose Your Romance and now optimized for Steam. Meet, romance, and fight alongside the gods and monsters of Greek mythology in the modern day over the course of several seasons! Plus, watch the trailer and collect illustrations of the most dramatic scenes. Skip ahead, save your progress, rewind & replay your favorite parts! Multiple endings to enjoy!

Set in New York, this legendary collection of tales revolves around an elite, top secret agency that solves cases for the gods and monsters of Greek Mythology. This mixture of drama, action and divine chemistry comes together to form love stories woven by the Fates themselves.

A new adventure feature has been added to the Steam release, so even players that have previously read the app version will discover more things to enjoy.
Try Astoria: Fate’s Kiss on a new platform and fall in love all over again.

The Story:
It's a dangerous thing, gods and monsters living among mortals.
Good thing your agency exists to keep them in line.
With big dreams and an even bigger heart, you aspire to climb the agency's ladder...
That is, until one day five mythical beings ask for your help!

"You don't know anything about monsters... yet."

People have always feared them, but...
Will you be the one to see them for what they truly are?

Characters:
Hydra 　　　"Ice Cold Fugitive"
Cerberus "Heart of Gold"
Chimera "Flirty Prince"
Medusa "Mysterious Ex-Gangster"
Hades "Divine Gentleman"
Alex Cyprin "Dashing Demigod"

Contents:
Main Stories from the app "Lovestruck: Choose Your Romance" up until Season 4

content_descriptors.notes: Some stories may contain scenes of a sexual nature not suitable for all ages.

name: Astoria: Fate's Kiss

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
